pages.text: $(l)Category:$() Medium Herbivore $(br)$(l)Tamable:$() True $(br)$(l)Aggression:$() Neutral $(br)$(l)Found In:$() Cold Biomes $(br2)$(l)Gender Dimorphism:$() $(br)Antler & Fang Variation (Females have no antlers and short, dull fangs.)

The Fanged Elk are a medium-sized, hard-hitting herbivore. Fanged Elk can be tamed with fruits, vegetables, or herbs, and can be saddled, chested and ridden. They automatically ground-tie themselves when dismounted. They come in many different color-marking combinations.
